Name: zul-iqembulezifundi
Author: Iqembu Lezifundiswa, Mussa Muhammad Telela , Uthman Mfanafuthi Msomi, Moulana Abdur Rahman Chilipa, Haji Ibrahim Mondli Japhet Mthembu, Moulana Imran Ngcobo, Moulana Eshaaq Osman
Source: Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa(IDM), https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Futhi abaholi babantu bakhe labo abengakholwa futhi ababephika ukuhlangana empilweni ezayo futhi esabanika ubuntofontofo empilweni yalomhlaba bathi, “lona akayilutho ngaphandle kokuba ngumuntu nje ofana njengani odla kulokho nani enidla kukona futhi ophuza kulokho nani eniphuza kukona”
Futhi uma nihlonipha umuntu ofana njengani ngempela nina ningabalahlekelweyo
Ngakube uyanethembisa yini ukuthi nina uma nifa futhi niba nguthuli namathambo niyovuswa (kabusha) na
Kukude, kude le! Lokho enethenjiswa kona
Akuyilutho ngaphandle kwempilo yethu yalomhlaba siyafa siphile futhi thina angeke sivuswe
Akayilutho ngaphandle kokuba yindoda eqambela uMvelinqangi amanga futhi thina angeke simkholwe
Wathi “Nkosi yami ngelekelele ngenxa yokuphika kwabo”
Wathi “esikhathini esincane nje ngempela bazobe sebezisola”
Ngakho-ke bathathwa ngumsindo ewesabekayo (isijeziso) sangempela sabe sesibenza ize leze ngakho-ke mabaqhele abantu abayizoni
Sabe sesivusa ezinye izizukulwane emva kwabo
Asikho isizwe esingasisheshisa isikhathi saso noma sisihlehlise

Sabe sesithumela izithunywa zethu esinye emva kwesinye ngasosonke isikhathi uma isizwe sifikelwa isithunywa saso sasisiphika ngakho-ke salandelanisa abanye babo ngabanye futhi sabenza ukuthi babe ngumlando nesifunda ngakho-ke mabaqhele (mabaphele) abantu abangakholwa
Sabe sesithumela uMose kanye nomfowabo u-Aroni nezimpawu zethu negunya elicacile
KuFaro nabaholi bakhe ngakho-ke bazigqaja futhi babengabantu abaziphakamisileyo
Base bethi “singakholelwa ebantwini ababili abafana njengathi kulapho abantu babo bobabili bethobela intando yethu na?”
Ngakho-ke babaphika bobabili base bebangabanye balabo ababhujiswa
Futhi ngempela samnikeza uMose incwadi ukuze baholeke
Futhi sayenza indodana kaMariya kanye nonina ukuthi babenguphawu futhi bobabili sabanika indawo yokuhlala ephakeme yokuphumula eyigeleza amanzi
